notes: The Mammoth said that McBain is Questionable for Wednesday's (Feb. 24) game versus the Avalanche, per Brogan Houston of the Deseret News.
The Vegas Golden Knights placed D Noah Hanifin on non-roster injured reserve.
Jets HC Scott Arniel relayed on Tuesday (Feb. 24) that Niederreiter is week-to-week, as per Mitchell Clinton of the team's official site.
The Golden Knights said that Eichel is OUT for Wednesday's (Feb. 25) game versus the Kings, per Danny Webster of the Las Vegas Review-Journal.
The Stars said that Hintz is Doubtful for Wednesday's (Feb. 25) game against the Kraken, as per Robert Tiffin of D Magazine.
The Canucks reported that Lankinen is OUT for Wednesday's (Feb. 25) game versus the Jets, as per Jeff Paterson of CanucksArmy.com.
Kapanen is expected to miss the first two games out of the Olympic break, as per Oilers TV reporter Paige Martin reports Sunday (Feb. 22).
The Capitals aid on Sunday (Feb. 22) that Carlson is currently considered day-to-day due to a lower body injury, according to Tom Gulitti of NHL.com.

The Maple Leafs said that Domi missed Thursday's (Feb. 19) practice due to personal reasons.
Crosby has been ruled out for Sunday's (Feb. 22) gold medal game against the United States at the 2026 Winter Olympics, as per Elliotte Friedman of Sportsnet.
Toffoli sustained a lower-body injury and is day-to-day, per Sheng Peng of San Jose Hockey Now.
Sundqvist didn't participate in Tuesday's (Feb. 17) practice after he underwent surgery during the Olympic break, per Lou Korac of NHL.com.

Wallstedt isn't available for Team Sweden's game against Italy on Wednesday (Feb. 11) at the 2026 Winter Olympics, per Elliotte Friedman of Sportsnet.

The Washington Capitals placed F Connor McMichael on injured reserve on Saturday (Jan. 31) and is week-to-week.

Hoglander did not play in Wednesday's (Feb. 5) game against the Golden Knights.

The Vancouver Canucks said on Friday (Jan. 30) that Boeser is a long shot to play again before the Olympic break.

The Utah Mammoth said on Monday (Feb. 2) that Cooley remains on injured reserve and likely won't be back in the lineup until after the 2026 Winter Olympics.
